ingredients.content: 18 oz mixed vegetables and fruit (e.g. 2 oz celeriac, 3.5 oz beetroot, 9 oz carrots, 3.5 oz apple), cut into pieces as needed

preparations.content: Place mixed vegetables and fruit, oil, vinegar, salt, pepper and sugar into mixing bowl. Chop with aid of spatula <b>5 sec/speed 5<b> and serve.
